name: UrlDNA_New_Scan
author: urlDNA.io (@urldna)
description: Perform a new scan on urlDNA.io

configurationItems.name: device
configurationItems.description: The device type used for scraping, either DESKTOP or MOBILE. Ensure that the selected Device, User Agent, and Viewport settings are consistent to maintain coherence

configurationItems.name: user_agent
configurationItems.description: The browser User Agent used for the scan. Ensure that the selected Device, User Agent, and Viewport settings are consistent to maintain coherence

configurationItems.name: viewport_width
configurationItems.description: The screen width of the viewport used for the scan. Ensure that the selected Device, User Agent, and Viewport settings are consistent to maintain coherence

configurationItems.name: viewport_height
configurationItems.description: The screen height of the viewport used for the scan. Ensure that the selected Device, User Agent, and Viewport settings are consistent to maintain coherence

configurationItems.name: scanned_from
configurationItems.description: Specifies the country from which the new scan is performed. This feature is available exclusively with the API Premium plan.

configurationItems.name: waiting_time
configurationItems.description: The waiting time for the page to load during the scan. It can be a number between 5 and 15 seconds

configurationItems.name: private_scan
configurationItems.description: The visibility setting for the new scan: False will make it publicly visible and searchable
